nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_701
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Little did she know that this picture would one day be worth more than a million dollars.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_702
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: While I understand what you say, I don't agree with you on the issue.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_703
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I think the police are meant to protect people.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_704
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I went to see him yesterday, only to find that he had gone abroad several days before.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_705
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: At the weekly meeting, everyone must confine their remarks to the subject.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_706
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: If only I hadn't said those silly words! I was too young then to distinguish right from wrong.
